content: this legal text explains the progress of a legal case without mentioning the names of the parties involved it discusses the various steps taken in the case such as the filing of a complaint the court reviewing the case issuing a summons to the defendant and the defendant responding with their defense the parties may engage in the discovery process and request additional evidence or witness testimonies if a settlement is not reached the case proceeds to trial where both parties present their arguments and evidence the court then evaluates the evidence and makes a decision based on the applicable laws if either party is dissatisfied with the courts decision they may have the option to appeal to a higher court in this specific case a compromise agreement was reached between the claimant and defendant settling their dispute in a civil case the agreement includes the division of an estate and the sale of an apartment property through a public auction the proceeds will be divided among the heirs according to their shares the parties also agreed to distribute the deceaseds bank account funds the court approves the compromise considers the proceedings closed and the parties are responsible for the procedural costs the court will shorten the time limit for filing an appeal to three days

metadata.subject_of_succession: estate, apartment property, bank account funds
